name: Yakima Exo SnowBank
description: Get your equipment to the mountain with a mount that swings away from your vehicle for  access. Pair with the EXO GearLocker and EXO TopShelf to store boots and gear. Now go snag that first chair.Tool-free cleat system attaches to EXO SwingBase or EXO TopShelf.Carries 5 pairs of skis up to 185cm or 4 snowboards.Locks skis and snowboards when not in use.Must have either EXO SwingBase or EXO TopShelf (sold separately).
